programmes.show_description: Add texture to your cards and projects with ease using Moonstone Embossing Folders by Hunkydory. Join Cat for the latest launch - Stylish Patterns!
Discover Janie's Originals Book Making Kits, Print Packs, Bookbinding Slope Tool, and more - everything you need to craft fun and unique projects from start to finish!
Join Cat for the latest Pocket Pads & Frames. Easily create truly cute card designs for all sorts of occasions with these super handy Pocket Pads.
Hailing from Nottinghamshire, the Dreamees always bring pretty projects and beautiful designs but always within everyone's budget. Tune in to find out why they are so popular.
The ground-breaking and market leading Adorable Scorable cardstock is back with A Touch of Colour, featuring a gorgeous selection of pastel colours!

HobbyMaker Repeats.
Crochet Society brings together beautifully curated projects, premium yarns, and exclusive patterns - perfect for creating thoughtful handmade presents for every occasion.
This bright and colourful Riley Blake Quilt is a perfect summer addition to your home, demonstrated by Becky Alexander-Frost.
Explore richly textured and beautifully patterned tapestry fabrics, perfect for upholstery, bags, cushions, and statement projects that need a touch of classic style and depth.
Becky Alexander-Frost is back for her second hour with her best selling Mini Project Case and Sycamore Bag, in new colourways and panels available.
We're finishing off the show today with an hour of Birthday quilts and kits!
NEW to HobbyMaker! An exciting creative collaboration with Sizzix featuring a range of nature inspired stamps, stencils and mixed-media tools. It's time to awaken the artist.
Emlems is back with a selection of Silicone Mould Sets featuring matching craft papers and pre-cut ephemera.
NEW to HobbyMaker! An exciting creative collaboration with Sizzix featuring a range of nature inspired stamps, stencils and mixed-media tools. It's time to awaken the artist.
Enjoy a crafty hour with Leona and exclusive deals on MDF Kits and stencils.

Discover a stunning new collection from renowned designer Jason Yenter, celebrated for his bold colour palettes, intricate florals, and striking border prints.
Beautiful new embroidery kits for your Spring weekends at home with Rowandean Embroidery.
Every sewing kit starts with the basics - the tools you'll reach for again and again for repairs, embellishments, or small projects.
Janie Burnett-Bleach is back on Sewing Street with best selling products, including her Sari Ribbon Packs and Leather Book Cover kits.
...Computerised Combo: Back in stock after a sell out launch show!
Step into Dawn's world of creativity! Explore a wealth of crafty ideas, try exciting new projects, and grab exclusive deals on a wide range of craft supplies.
Take cardmaking to new heights with the Floral Awakenings Decoupage Toppers. The designs cover a host of themes allowing you to create stunning dimensional cards with ease.
Join Nikky and discover new stencils, including Boho Daisy Love and Retro Rounded Square, plus the Stars & Celebrations stencil bundle - perfect for your next creative project!
The Window to the Heart - Floral Wishes Concept Card Kit brings you a beautiful mix of images and poetry suitable for making heartfelt cards all year round for special moments.
Join Ali Reeve for a relaxed hour of crafting inspiration, featuring new products, expert demos, and great offers to top up your stash.
Join Carla as she brings us the best of stateside crafting from American Crafts with innovative tools and papercraft supplies - practical, well-designed, and easy to use.
Join Nikky and discover the new All Occasions Stamp & Die Bundle, Timeless spring bundle, All About the Dudes Stamps and Papers Bundle - perfect for your next creative project!
